The Glean Document ID is supported for cases where the Answer ID isn't available. If both are available, using the Answer ID is preferred.","example":"ANSWERS_answer_3"}},"title":"AnswerDocId"},{"type":"object","required":["id"]}],"title":"DeleteAnswerRequest"}}},"description":"DeleteAnswer request","required":true,"x-exportParamName":"Request"}}
